name: Lizard
description: A tiny cold-blooded reptile, often blending into its environment with sharp claws and teeth, primarily found in warm climates.
memorable: Lizards can detach their tails as a defensive maneuver, allowing them to escape danger.
goals: Primarily to survive by evading predators and finding food.
relations: Often used as familiars or pets by spellcasters.
environment: Commonly found in deserts, jungles, and rocky areas.
strengths: Excellent climbers and possess the ability to evade detection.
weaknesses: Extremely fragile with low hit points and poor combat capabilities.
attacks: Bite attack inflicts 1 piercing damage, with low odds of success.
most_powerful_ability: Detach Tail allows it to reduce damage taken and escape quickly.
senses: Has darkvision with a range of 30 feet, helping it navigate low-light environments.
skills: Passive Perception of 9 indicates very basic awareness of surroundings.
additional_information: Very low challenge rating, making it an inconsequential combatant.
Can serve as a useful companion or scout for low-level characters.
Common prey animal in ecosystems, easily overlooked.
Lacks significant combat abilities, focusing on stealth and evasion.
Incapacitated creatures take no damage if bitten by the Lizard.
